VoiceUserPreferences.name: VoiceUserPreferences
VoiceUserPreferences.description: Represents the number the user displays when making outbound calls.

CallerIdType.description: The number displayed for outbound calls. The possible values are: VendorLine CompanyNumber LocalPresence CustomCallerId

DeskPhoneNumber.description: A separate phone number users can utilize as part of a call bridge.

OwnerId.description: ID of the phone number owner.
